name: Slender - Home Sweet Home
description:
Good old Slender. The Game includes 4 Main Stages and 1 Bonus Stage after completing the Story Mode.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

LMB or E - Interact

RMB or F - Flashlight

Space - Other Actions

ESC - Pause Menu

Note: If you're having problems with Input, try pausing the game (ESC) and unpause it right after. It should fix the issue.
